solution_line_template: He's cooking for {num_people} people and wants to serve {scallops_per_person} scallops per person so he needs {num_people}*{scallops_per_person} = <<{num_people}*{scallops_per_person}={total_scallops}>>{total_scallops} scallops

{scallops_per_pound} jumbo scallops come in 1 pound and he needs {total_scallops} scallops so he will need {total_scallops}/{scallops_per_pound} = <<{total_scallops}/{scallops_per_pound}={total_pounds}>>{total_pounds} pounds of scallops

A pound of scallops weigh ${price_per_pound}.00 and he needs {total_pounds} pounds so it will cost him {price_per_pound}*{total_pounds} = $<<{price_per_pound}*{total_pounds}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} for scallops
